name: Unchained
title: ETF Outflows Explained
text:
Synopsis
Large hedge funds are engaging in arbitrage trades within cryptocurrency ETFs, leveraging low-cost borrowing and exploiting basis differences on the CME exchange.

Key Insights
- Major hedge funds are actively participating in ETF arbitrage strategies
- These funds can borrow money at extremely low rates
- Arbitrage opportunities exist through capturing the annualized basis on CME
- The trades involve minimal exchange risk by executing legs on CME and ETFs
- Significant capital movements (hundreds of millions) are driven by these basis capture strategies
